headline.main: ITALIAN TROOPS SEEN REPLACING RUMANIANS; Antonescu Out of War Post in Rift With Hitler, British Say

lead_paragraph: General Ion Antonescu, dictator-Premier of Nazi-controlled Rumania, has quit his post in the German war machine as a result of quarrels between Adolf Hitler and Rumanian leaders, according to a British radio report last night, and clashes between Rumanian divisions and German Elite Guard units have damaged morale so severely that Hitler has replaced the Rumanians with Italians on the Bessarabian front against Russia.
abstract: Hitler replaces Rumanian troops with Itals as German-Rumanian Army leaders disagree; Gen Antonescu reptd to have resigned post as comdr of German-Rumanian forces; Brit declare Finland enemy territory
